exec: pm.test("Status code name has string", function () {
pm.test("Status code name has string", function () {

body.raw:
{
    "InterviewButtonUnavailable": "New -Interview button is not available",
    "TooFewAnswers": "New -Too few answers, minimum is {minimum}",
    "TooManyAnswers": "New -Too many answers, maximum is {maximum}",
    "ItemAnswerRequired": "New -Please specify an answer for {item}",
    "CategoryAnswerRequired": "New -Please specify an answer for {category}",
    "AnswerRequired": "New -An answer is required",
    "NotInRange": "New -Answer {answer} is not in the permitted range, permitted range is {range}",
    "TooManyDigitsInIntegerPart": "New -Answer {answer} has too many digits, maximum is {maximum}",
    "LessThanMinimum": "New -Answer {answer} is too small, minimum is {minimum}",
    "MoreThanMaximum": "New -Answer {answer} is too big, maximum is {maximum}",
    "MustBeNumeric": "New -Answer {answer} must be numeric",
    "TooManyDigitsFraction": "New -Answer {answer} has too many fractional digits, maximum is {maximumDigits}",
    "DoNotUseBrowserButtonToNavigate": "New -Do not use browser navigation buttons, use interview buttons instead",
    "ExclusiveCategory": "New -Category {category} cannot be used together with other categories",
    "InvalidCategory": "New -The chosen category is not present in the list of available categories.",
    "ButtonPause": "New -Pause",
    "ButtonStart": "New -Start",
    "ButtonClear": "New -Clear",
    "ButtonBack": "New -Back",
    "ButtonNext": "New -Next",
    "Name": "New language",
    "AnswerTooLong": "New -Answer {anser} is too long, maximum is {numberOfCharacters}",
    "DoNotUseButtonWithOtherAnswer": "New -The answer \"{item}\" cannot be used in conjunction with other answers"
}
